group_1.narration: [textBlack:20××, December ××, 18:00]@[textBlack:In a certain place,]@[textBlack:there were two twins that lived far apart.]
[textBlack:The younger twin found fluffy gloves ]@[textBlack:just before Christmas.]
[textBlack:Several days before, she couldn't buy them at]@[textBlack:other stores because they were too expensive...]
[textBlack:But at the next store, she was able to spend]@[textBlack:her pocket money she had saved.]

group_1.textLeft: I've never read this book before. Do you know it,@Nemu?

group_1.textRight: It's not Touka's book, right? It's not from my@collection.
It's also not "A Christmas Carol."

group_1.textLeft: How strange...
Where in the world did this book come from,@getting mixed in with ours?

group_1.textRight: I don't have the slightest idea, but the contents@are not unfamiliar to me.
The twins written here are most likely the@Amane sisters.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so...?

group_1.textRight: This diary-style fairy tale...for now let's refer to@it as a diary.
If the current time matches the time written in@this diary...
Then Tsukasa should appear here shortly.

group_1.textLeft: It's exactly as Nemu said! When did you change@your occupation to prophet?

group_1.textRight: I merely recalled what Mifuyu had told me...
Last Christmas...
An anecdote that the sisters gave each other@presents.
Nemu, listen to this!
Just a little while ago, a wonderful thing@happened.

group_1.textLeft: ...What kind of thing?

group_1.textRight: It was like a heartwarming short story straight@from O. Henry.

group_1.textLeft: ...That's drawn my interest.
...That made me a little interested too.
If Mifuyu was so excited to come tell you.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I knew it would make you curious.
But I'll tell you about the "heartwarming" details@later.
Right now it has nothing to do with us.

group_1.textLeft: If it's only going to get my hopes up, then don't@bring it up!

group_1.textRight: It's not that important now, it's the actions that@Tsukasa takes from here on that are.
...According to Mifuyu's story, Tsukasa is in this@shopping district today...
To purchase fluffy gloves as a present@for Tsukuyo.

group_1.textLeft: The diary did also mention gloves.
If this is also as Nemu says...
Then the mysterious power time slip theory is@confirmed!
Is that what you're saying?

group_1.textRight: It helps that you understand so well.
Now, Tsukasa is passing by the store in question.

group_1.textLeft: What happens after that?

group_1.textRight: She should notice the discount sale poster and@promptly decide to buy the gloves.

group_1.textLeft: ...Hm? Did something just fly by?

group_1.narration: Import Brand 40% off discount sale going on now!

group_1.textRight: [chara:110702:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
This is...the poster from that store?

group_1.textLeft: Nemuuu! Tsukasa is right in front of the store...

group_1.textRight: ...She passed by without stopping.

group_1.textLeft: What does this mean?

group_1.textRight: Could this be a contradiction between the past@as I know it and the actual past?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* This may be a difficult situation, huh?
Will a time paradox occur...
And cause us to cease to exist?

group_1.textRight: ...?! Touka disappeared?

group_1.textLeft: Nemu did tooo!

group_1.textRight: This is...
